services.title: Our Psychological Services
services.subtitle: Professional therapeutic services designed to support your mental health journey.

individual.title: Individual Therapy
individual.description: One-on-one therapy sessions tailored to your specific needs and goals. Work through personal challenges, develop coping strategies, and achieve emotional wellness.

couples.title: Couples Therapy
couples.description: Specialized therapy for couples to improve communication, resolve conflicts, and strengthen relationships. Build a healthier, more fulfilling partnership.

family.title: Family Therapy
family.description: Family therapy sessions to improve communication, resolve conflicts, and strengthen family bonds. Create a more harmonious family environment.

anxiety.title: Anxiety Treatment
anxiety.description: Specialized treatment for anxiety disorders using evidence-based approaches like CBT. Learn to manage anxiety and regain control of your life.

depression.title: Depression Therapy
depression.description: Comprehensive treatment for depression using proven therapeutic methods. Work towards emotional healing and renewed hope for the future.

biography.title: Biography
biography.content: Dr. Sarah Ahmed is a licensed clinical psychologist with over 15 years of experience in mental health treatment. She specializes in anxiety disorders, depression, and family therapy. Dr. Ahmed founded Nafsyetak with the vision of making quality mental health care accessible to everyone.

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.phd: Ph.D. in Clinical Psychology - Cairo University
education.license: Licensed Clinical Psychologist - Egyptian Ministry of Health

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and mental health.

q1.question: How do I know if I need therapy?
q1.answer: Consider therapy if you're experiencing persistent sadness, anxiety, relationship problems, or difficulty coping with daily life. Therapy can help anyone looking to improve their mental wellness.

q2.question: What should I expect in my first session?
q2.answer: Your first session involves getting to know your therapist, discussing your concerns and goals, and creating a treatment plan. It's a safe space to share your thoughts and feelings.

q3.question: How long does therapy take?
q3.answer: The duration varies based on individual needs and goals. Some people benefit from short-term therapy (8-12 sessions), while others prefer longer-term support.

q4.question: Is everything I say confidential?
q4.answer: Yes, everything discussed in therapy is strictly confidential, except in rare cases where there's a risk of harm to yourself or others, as required by law.

q5.question: Do you accept insurance?
q5.answer: We accept most major insurance plans. Please contact us to verify your coverage and discuss payment options.

q6.question: Can I switch therapists if needed?
q6.answer: Absolutely. Finding the right therapeutic fit is important. We'll help you find another therapist within our practice if needed.
